{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WBMR-HP |revision=-G300H |asin=B005584W2E;GB; |fcc_date=11/24/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=AR7516 |manuf_rev=VW22-A-J6 |availability=common |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=RAXAR7516VW |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 50810;PSB 50810 EL, (XWAY ARX168); |cpu1_cspeed=333 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29GL256ELT2I-90Q |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4H511638F-LCCC |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9223 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8316 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.11.1 |default_user=root |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AirStation NFINITI High Power Wireless-N ADSL2+ Modem Router}} :[http://www.buffalo-technology.com/en/products/networking/300mbps-wireless/routers/airstation-nfiniti-high-power-gigabit-broadband-adsl2-modem-router/ Product page] OEM: [[Arcadyan]] AR7516VW22-A-J6 *CPU: [[Lantiq]] PSB 50810 EL (XWAY ARX168) @333MHz SoC AR9 :ADSL2+ CPE Solution for Router and Gateway Applications *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/wbmr-hp-g300h ''Buffalo WBMR-HP-G300H'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] 
Architecture:	MIPS 34Kc
Vendor:         Lantiq
Bootloader:	U-Boot 1.00
System-On-Chip:	Lantiq AR9
CPU:            Lantiq PSB 50810
Speed:  	333MHz
Flash:  	32MB
RAM:	        64MB
Wireless:       Atheros AR9280 Rev:2
Ethernet:       4x GbE Atheros AR8316
Modem:	        Lantiq ADSL2+
USB:	        Yes, 1x 2.0 (driver dwc_otg)
Serial:	        Yes
JTAG:	        Yes
:Per the DD-WRT router database, this device has 32MB Flash.
